alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 31 at 4:01PM AKDT until May 31 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR WEST ANCHORAGE AND THE ANCHORAGE HILLSIDE... * Winds...Southeast winds 12 to 18 mph with gusts to 25 mph. * Timing...Winds will develop in the early evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 60s to low 70s. * Location...West Anchorage and the Anchorage Hillside. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth, and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
